details.title: Baywatch practical automatic detection of intrusion over water
details.abstract: This paper describes one solution to the problem of providing Perimeter Intruder Detection, (PIDS), for sites whose boundary includes direct access from uncontrolled water. Two surveillance heads were proposed, each consisting of a TI camera and a Colour CCTV camera mounted on a pan and tilt unit
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
